price: Sabõda haka, ka yi haƙuri kamar yadda mãsu ƙarfin niyya daga Manzanni suka yi haƙuri. Kuma kada ka yi musu gaggãwa. Kamar dai sũ, a rãnar da suke ganin (sakamako) abin da ake yi musu wa'adi ba su zauna ba, fãce sa'a guda daga yini. Iyarwa dai da Manzanci). Shin, akwai wanda za a halakar? (Bãbu), fãce mutãne fasiƙai.
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ كَمَا صَبَرَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡعَزۡمِ مِنَ ٱلرُّسُلِ وَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِل لَّهُمۡۚ كَأَنَّهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَ مَا يُوعَدُونَ لَمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا سَاعَةٗ مِّن نَّهَارِۭۚ بَلَٰغٞۚ فَهَلۡ يُهۡلَكُ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
